001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.ProjectGradesImporter.ProjectScore;
004import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
005import org.mockito.ArgumentCaptor;
006import org.slf4j.Logger;
007import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
008
009import java.io.Reader;
010import java.io.StringReader;
011import java.util.regex.Matcher;
012
013import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
014import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.containsString;
015import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.equalTo;
016import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertThrows;
017import static org.mockito.Mockito.*;
018
019public class ProjectGradesImporterTest {
020
021  private Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(this.getClass().getPackage().getName());
022
023  @Test
024  public void gradedProjectWithNoGradeThrowsScoreNotFoundException() throws ProjectGradesImporter.ScoreNotFoundException {
025    GradedProject project = new GradedProject();
026    project.addLine("asdfhjkl");
027    project.addLine("iadguow");
028
029    assertThrows(ProjectGradesImporter.ScoreNotFoundException.class, () ->
030      ProjectGradesImporter.getScoreFrom(project.getReader())
031    );
032  }
033
034  @Test
035  public void scoreRegularExpressionWorkWithSimpleCase() {
036    Matcher matcher = ProjectGradesImporter.scorePattern.matcher("3.0 out of 4.5");
037    assertThat(matcher.find(), equalTo(true));
038    assertThat(matcher.groupCount(), equalTo(2));
039    assertThat(matcher.group(1), equalTo("3.0"));
040    assertThat(matcher.group(2), equalTo("4.5"));
041  }
042
043  @Test
044  public void gradedProjectWithOutOfHasValidScore() throws ProjectGradesImporter.ScoreNotFoundException {
045    GradedProject project = new GradedProject();
046    project.addLine("3.4 out of 3.5");
047    project.addLine("iadguow");
048
049    ProjectScore score = ProjectGradesImporter.getScoreFrom(project.getReader());
050    assertThat(score.getScore(), equalTo(3.4));
051    assertThat(score.getTotalPoints(), equalTo(3.5));
052  }
053
054  @Test
055  public void scoreMatchesRegardlessOfCase() {
056    Matcher matcher = ProjectGradesImporter.scorePattern.matcher("4.0 OUT OF 5.0");
057    assertThat(matcher.find(), equalTo(true));
058    assertThat(matcher.groupCount(), equalTo(2));
059    assertThat(matcher.group(1), equalTo("4.0"));
060    assertThat(matcher.group(2), equalTo("5.0"));
061  }
062
063  @Test
064  public void scoreMatchesIntegerPoints() {
065    Matcher matcher = ProjectGradesImporter.scorePattern.matcher("4 out of 5");
066    assertThat(matcher.find(), equalTo(true));
067    assertThat(matcher.groupCount(), equalTo(2));
068    assertThat(matcher.group(1), equalTo("4"));
069    assertThat(matcher.group(2), equalTo("5"));
070  }
071
072  @Test
073  public void scoreMatchesInTheMiddleOfOtherText() {
074    Matcher matcher = ProjectGradesImporter.scorePattern.matcher("You got 4 out of 5 points");
075    assertThat(matcher.find(), equalTo(true));
076    assertThat(matcher.groupCount(), equalTo(2));
077    assertThat(matcher.group(1), equalTo("4"));
078    assertThat(matcher.group(2), equalTo("5"));
079  }
080
081  @Test
082  public void gradedProjectWithIntegerPoints() throws ProjectGradesImporter.ScoreNotFoundException {
083    GradedProject project = new GradedProject();
084    project.addLine("3 out of 5");
085    project.addLine("iadguow");
086
087    ProjectScore score = ProjectGradesImporter.getScoreFrom(project.getReader());
088    assertThat(score.getScore(), equalTo(3.0));
089    assertThat(score.getTotalPoints(), equalTo(5.0));
090  }
091
092  private class GradedProject {
093    private StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
094
095    public void addLine(String line) {
096      sb.append(line);
097      sb.append("\n");
098    }
099
100    public Reader getReader() {
101      return new StringReader(sb.toString());
102    }
103  }
104
105  @Test
106  public void onlyFirstScoreIsReturned() throws ProjectGradesImporter.ScoreNotFoundException {
107    GradedProject project = new GradedProject();
108    project.addLine("3.4 out of 3.5");
109    project.addLine("iadguow");
110    project.addLine("3.3 out of 3.4");
111
112    ProjectScore score = ProjectGradesImporter.getScoreFrom(project.getReader());
113    assertThat(score.getScore(), equalTo(3.4));
114    assertThat(score.getTotalPoints(), equalTo(3.5));
115  }
116
117  @Test
118  public void scoreIsRecordedInGradeBook() throws ProjectGradesImporter.ScoreNotFoundException {
119    String studentId = "student";
120    Assignment assignment = new Assignment("project", 6.0);
121
122    GradeBook gradeBook = new GradeBook("test");
123    gradeBook.addStudent(new Student(studentId));
124    gradeBook.addAssignment(assignment);
125
126    String score = "5.8";
127    GradedProject project = new GradedProject();
128    project.addLine(score + " out of 6.0");
129    project.addLine("");
130    project.addLine("asdfasd");
131
132    Logger logger = mock(Logger.class);
133    ProjectGradesImporter importer = new ProjectGradesImporter(gradeBook, assignment, logger);
134    importer.recordScoreFromProjectReport(studentId, project.getReader());
135
136    assertThat(gradeBook.getStudent(studentId).get().getGrade(assignment.getName()).getScore(), equalTo(5.8));
137    assertThat(gradeBook.isDirty(), equalTo(true));
138
139    ArgumentCaptor<String> message = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(String.class);
140    verify(logger).info(message.capture());
141    assertThat(message.getValue(), containsString("Recorded grade of " + score + " for " + studentId));
142  }
143
144  @Test
145  public void throwIllegalStateExceptionWhenTotalPointsInReportDoesNotMatchGradeBook() throws ProjectGradesImporter.ScoreNotFoundException {
146    String studentId = "student";
147    Assignment assignment = new Assignment("project", 8.0);
148
149    GradeBook gradeBook = new GradeBook("test");
150    gradeBook.addStudent(new Student(studentId));
151    gradeBook.addAssignment(assignment);
152
153    GradedProject project = new GradedProject();
154    project.addLine("5.8 out of 6.0");
155    project.addLine("");
156    project.addLine("asdfasd");
157
158    ProjectGradesImporter importer = new ProjectGradesImporter(gradeBook, assignment, logger);
159    assertThrows(IllegalStateException.class, () ->
160      importer.recordScoreFromProjectReport(studentId, project.getReader())
161    );
162  }
163
164  @Test
165  public void logWarningWhenStudentDoesNotExistInGradeBook() throws ProjectGradesImporter.ScoreNotFoundException {
166    String studentId = "student";
167    Assignment assignment = new Assignment("project", 6.0);
168
169    GradeBook gradeBook = new GradeBook("test");
170    gradeBook.addAssignment(assignment);
171
172    GradedProject project = new GradedProject();
173    project.addLine("5.8 out of 6.0");
174    project.addLine("");
175    project.addLine("asdfasd");
176
177    Logger logger = mock(Logger.class);
178    ProjectGradesImporter importer = new ProjectGradesImporter(gradeBook, assignment, logger);
179
180    importer.recordScoreFromProjectReport(studentId, project.getReader());
181
182    assertThat(gradeBook.containsStudent(studentId), equalTo(false));
183
184    ArgumentCaptor<String> message = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(String.class);
185    verify(logger, times(1)).warn(message.capture());
186    assertThat(message.getValue(), containsString("Student \"" + studentId + "\" not found in gradebook"));
187  }
188
189}
